channel.title: [REQ] Shops in The Music/ Quest Menu
channel.description: yup, so i need to know how to put all of my shops in the music or quest menu

item.title: [REQ] Shops in The Music/ Quest Menu
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

You need to get the frame ids for things in those sections. You then need to output the text you want.

After you do that, you need to add the correct cases to the switch statement inside case 185, which is in the parseIncomingPackets method. =\

Read full topic
item.source: [REQ] Shops in The Music/ Quest Menu
